modules.name: Stereo Effects
modules.description: Stereo effects processor with Delay, Reverb, and Echo

modules.name: MIDI Clock Sync
modules.description: MIDI clock synchronization with BPM control, clock output, reset output, and trigger output with multiple divisions (1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/8, 1/16, 1/32, T)

modules.name: Chord Synth
modules.description: Multi-layer microtonal chord synthesizer with motion, modulation, and effects

modules.name: Chord Pad Synth
modules.description: Pad synthesizer with 4 chord slots, clock-triggered progression, and pad presets

modules.name: Chord Pluck Synth
modules.description: Pluck synthesizer with 4 chord slots, arpeggiator, and pluck presets (Piano, Harp, Organ, etc.)

modules.name: Ambient Random Synth
modules.description: Ambient random synthesizer inspired by OMNIA

modules.name: Organic Particle Synth
modules.description: Organic particle synthesizer with oscillator and granular synthesis modes

modules.name: Buildup Looper
modules.description: Build-up looper: pass-through until trigger, then loop recent audio with accelerating speed

modules.name: WT SURGE X
modules.description: Serum-style wavetable oscillator with dual bank, warp modes, unison, and WAV import
